title: Funeral for a Dog
overview: Journalist Daniel Mandelkern travels to Italy for an interview with celebrated writer Mark Svensson, who lives by a secluded lake. Daniel is intrigued by the mysterious story of Mark, his friend Tuuli and Tuuli's missing partner Felix. It's a story of a strong bond between three people that starts in South America and travels across the Artic Circle to New York on 11th September, ending with a catastrophic loss. Daniel thinks he recognises these people from Mark's novel, however something is not quite right and as he delves deeper, he makes a shocking discovery.
